dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3156307Z] Copyright violation on customers account
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2007 7:45 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3156307Z] Copyright violation on customers account ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright violation on customers account Added by system at Tuesday, Feb 20 2007 01:44 pm X-MailFrom: scott@lvcomputer.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Feb 20 13:44:38 2007 Received: (qmail 3985 invoked by alias); 20 Feb 2007 19:44:38 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 3982 invoked from network); 20 Feb 2007 19:44:38 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 20 Feb 2007 19:44:38 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 20 Feb 2007 13:44:37 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 20 Feb 2007 13:44:35 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1172000670-31720-875-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from fed1rmmtao105.cox.net (fed1rmmtao105.cox.net [68.230.241.41]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 7E06D6C0BB for ; Tue, 20 Feb 2007 13:44:35 -0600 (CST) Received: from fed1rmimpo01.cox.net ([70.169.32.71]) by fed1rmmtao105.cox.net (InterMail vM.7.05.02.00 201-2174-114-20060621) with ESMTP id <20070220194420.QAXT21177.fed1rmmtao105.cox.net@fed1rmimpo01.cox.net> for ; Tue, 20 Feb 2007 14:44:20 -0500 Received: from siscott ([72.193.87.65]) by fed1rmimpo01.cox.net with bizsmtp id RvkJ1W00L1QbKVC0000000; Tue, 20 Feb 2007 14:44:19 -0500 From: "Scott Israel" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Copyright violation on customers account Subject: Copyright violation on customers account Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2007 11:44:18 -0800 Message-ID: <007b01c75527$82c39610$884ac230$@com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_007C_01C754E4.74A05610" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 12.0 Thread-Index: AcdVJ4Js+lDlMITEQZeJ1Y7BaLLrjg== Content-Language: en-us X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: scott@lvcomputer.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 20 Feb 2007 19:44:35.0836 (UTC) FILETIME=[8CD763C0:01C75527] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multipart message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello, One of your accounts located on your server has stolen our content from our website. The site in question is: ashconsultants.com The webpage in question is located here: http://www.ashconsultants.com/index_files/Page2132.htm The stolen information comes directly from our website: http://www.sicomputersolutions.com/services.shtml You can see from the website they didn't even bother to change the company name under managed e-mail and webhosting to their company name. We have sent an e-mail to the infringing website owner regarding this matter as well. We request that the webpage or website be removed for violation of our copyrighted material. Best Regards, Scott Israel MCSE,MCSA,MCP,CNST,CST,Net+,A+ President SI Computer Solutions Inc. Office: 702-943-0759 Toll-Free: 866-532-1794 Fax: 702-434-2001 Mobile: 702-845-6948 Business Hours: M-F 8am-5pm PST Mailing: 631 N. Stephanie ST #258 Henderson, NV 89014 Web: http://www.sicomputersolutions.com Web Hosting: http://www.valleyhosting.com MIME element (text/html)

Hello,

 

One of your accounts located on your server has stolen our content from our website. The site in question is: ashconsultants.com

The webpage in question is located here: http://www .ashconsultants.com/index_files/Page2132.htm

 

The stolen information comes directly from our website: http://www.sicomputersolutions.com/services.shtml

 

You can see from the website they didn’t even bother to change the company name under managed e-mail and webhosting to their company name. We have sent an e-mail to the infringing website owner regarding this matter as well. We request that the webpage or website be removed for violation of our copyrighted material.

 

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Scott Israel

MCSE,MCSA,MCP, CNST,CST,Net+,A+

President

SI Computer Solutions Inc.

Office: & nbsp;       702-943-0759

Mailing:  631 N. Stephanie ST #258

  &n bsp;           He nderson, NV 89014

Web: http://www.sicomputersolutions.com 

Web Hosting: http://www.valleyhosting.com

 

 

 

MIME element (text/plain)
